channel.title: AntiRandoms
channel.description: Can someone please make a scar file that has all the antirandoms, and that you can put into scripts. For the random text, it would be great if you could make it only text when it sees a white dot on the minimap, as that is a real live person. Thanks

item.title: AntiRandoms
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Can someone please make a scar file that has all the antirandoms, and that you can put into scripts.
For the random text, it would be great if you could make it only text when it sees a white dot on the minimap, as that is a real live person. Thanks
